text: I want to end everythingNothing ever gets better   Getting only worse and worse   Im   and i can say that never  NEVER in my life i felt protected  or cared   I havent left my room for   years  fully isolated from even my parents  who hate me for being gay   I met this guy  who i fell in love with and for the first time i felt like there was a hope for me to end this kind of life and live like a normal human being  but he left   He says hes family and friends wont accept that he loves a guy and is now with a girl   Every morning i wake up from terrifying dreams and first thing i do is check my phone  if there is any notification i have muted everything else  hoping he will simply wish me good day  But no   I could not take the courses i wanted to take cause in my country i simply couldn t find non homophobic job   If this is how its always going to be  what s the point   if theres noone who is just gonna hold me And when ill be old  ill die and noone will notice it until my body starts rotting and then they might find it  Is that worth all the tears  all the nights where i simply cant sleep and if i do i have terrible dreams
